name: Rumor Mill
description:
For Ludum Dare 46's theme "Keep it alive."

Made in GDevelop 5.

Art by Google Slides. ;)

Fail and Success music made in HumOn.

Common License Music: "Treasure Finding " and "Time Attack Against the Universe" from Komiku's album Poupi's Incredible Adventure.

My first attempt at making a platformer and second time making a small game in GDevelop.
